last_episode_to_air.name: What Goes Up
last_episode_to_air.overview: As the 1987 market crash looms, the Exchange braces for a critical all-nighter. Putting their personal lives on hold, Farida and Munira join the storm.

name: The Exchange
overview: Set in Kuwait in 1988, two women making their way in the boys club of the Kuwait Stock Exchange, on the eve of Saddam Hussein's invasion of the country.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Inspired by real events, two women set out to pioneer the cutthroat stock market of 1980s Kuwait — and disrupt its corrupt boys club along the way.

episodes.name: Bank of Tomorrow
episodes.overview: As the ink dries on her divorce papers, Farida contends with her new reality. A charity auction reignites a friendly rivalry between her and Munira.

episodes.name: It’s a Man’s World
episodes.overview: On their first days at work and school, Farida seeks an alliance and Jude keeps a low profile. Feeling unheard, Munira takes matters into her own hands.

episodes.name: Thicker than Milk
episodes.overview: As the family meticulously plans for its matriarch's 80th, Munira finds tactical inspiration in an unlikely place. Farida pursues more independence.

episodes.name: Short and Distort
episodes.overview: The duo’s success lands them in the limelight, but the bank’s secret plan finds them between a rock and a hard place — and snubbed by their loved ones.

episodes.name: The Silent Partner
episodes.overview: After realizing that their presence in an important meeting is merely for show, Farida and Munira forge their own path — despite external distractions.

episodes.name: What Goes Up
episodes.overview: As the 1987 market crash looms, the Exchange braces for a critical all-nighter. Putting their personal lives on hold, Farida and Munira join the storm.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Inspired by real events, two women set out to pioneer the cutthroat stock market of 1980s Kuwait — and disrupt its corrupt boys club along the way.
